description.value:
Requirements You have a hand free and are adjacent to an ally who isn't at full Hit Points.

You perform a token medical effort to convince an ally they've recovered from an injury. Attempt a Deception check with the same DC as for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}. On a success, the target gains half the corresponding amount of Hit Points as temporary Hit Points. These temporary Hit Points last 1 round. Kiss It Better doesn't remove the wounded condition. Increase the DC by 2 if you aren't holding or wearing a medkit. The target is temporarily immune to Kiss it Better for 24 hours.
